item.title: Annoucing Super16
item.description: Super16 is my new project! Please check it out on its project page.

item.title: Super16
item.description: Super16… What is it? Super16 is my custom architechture for a theoretical CPU. It’s on github! I have designed the thing from the ground up, so here’s an overview: Features: Text-out support 7 16-bit registers Binary compilation 16-bit data on every instruction Built-in screen drawing (pixel by pixel) Missing stuff: Any support for memory, I mean who needs that? Basic design: One instruction is composed of 32 bits, making up 3 catagories; Opcode, Register and data.
